nodes.text: Majilop was a world located within the star system of the same name, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Lol sector. Around the year 10 ABY, it served as the homeworld of the Lucin Syndicate, a major producer and distributor of illegal holoporn.

Majilop was mentioned in the 1994 sourcebook Galaxy Guide 11: Criminal Organizations, written by Rick D. Stuart for West End Games Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Majilop system, and therefore the planet Majilop, in grid square Q-18.
